TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 控制由 序列化屬性 (Attribute) 目標後所產生的 XML 結構描述。

span.span: Controls the XML schema that is generated when the attribute target is serialized by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於一系列屬性可控制如何序列化或還原序列化物件。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 如需類似屬性的完整清單，請參閱[屬性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 您可以套用類別、 結構、 列舉或介面宣告。You can apply the to a class, structure, enumeration, or interface declaration. 套用指定 XML 類型的命名空間、 XML 的型別名稱，以及是否要包含在 XML 結構描述文件類型的類別。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看設定之屬性的結果類別，並編譯為可執行檔或 DLL，應用程式同時傳遞至所產生的檔案[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 工具會將結構描述，包括類型定義。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定屬性`false`、 [XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)不包含結構描述中的型別。If you set the property to `false`, the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) does not include the type in the schema. 根據預設，每個公用類別，產生 XSD 工具`complexType`和該類型的項目。By default, for each public class, the XSD tool generates a `complexType` and an element of that type. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87). > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用 word`XmlType`取代較長程式碼中。You can use the word `XmlType` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個類別的已套用。The following example shows two classes to which the has been applied. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個執行個體類別，可用來覆寫兩個類別的序列化。The following example creates two instances of the class that are used to override the serialization of the two classes. [!code-cpp[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/CPP/xmltypeattribute1_2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/CS/xmltypeattribute1_2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/VB/xmltypeattribute1_2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string typeName) cil managed

param.name: typeName
param.span: XML 型別的名稱，是 序列化類別執行個體時所產生的 (並且對類別執行個體進行還原序列化時所辨識的)。

span.span: The name of the XML type that the generates when it serializes the class instance (and recognizes when it deserializes the class instance).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定 XML 型別的名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name of the XML type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用指定 XML 類型的命名空間、 XML 的型別名稱，以及是否要包含在 XML 結構描述文件類型的類別。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看設定之屬性的結果類別，並編譯為可執行檔或 DLL，應用程式同時傳遞至所產生的檔案[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 工具會將結構描述，包括類型定義。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個執行個體類別，可用來覆寫兩個類別的序列化。The following example creates two instances of the class that are used to override the serialization of the two classes. [!code-cpp[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/CPP/xmltypeattribute1_2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/CS/xmltypeattribute1_2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/VB/xmltypeattribute1_2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AnonymousType { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，判斷產生的結構描述型別是否為 XSD 匿名型別。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the resulting schema type is an XSD anonymous type.

value.span: 如果產生的結構描述型別是 XSD 匿名型別則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the resulting schema type is an XSD anonymous type; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeInSchema { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否將型別包含在 XML 結構描述文件中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the type in XML schema documents.

value.span: 若要將型別包含於 XML 結構描述文件中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to include the type in XML schema documents; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用指定 XML 類型的命名空間、 XML 的型別名稱，以及是否要包含在 XML 結構描述文件類型的類別。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看設定之屬性的結果類別、 您應用程式編譯為可執行檔或 DLL，並將產生的檔案傳遞至 XML 結構描述定義工具 (XSD.exe)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the XML Schema Definition tool (XSD.exe). 工具會將結構描述，包括類型定義。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. ## Examples 下列範例會套用至`ExtraneousInfo`類別，設定屬性`false`。The following example applies the to the `ExtraneousInfo` class, setting the property to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 型別的命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the XML type.
The namespace of the XML type.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會套用時設定的類別屬性。The following example applies the to a class while setting the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 型別的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML type.
The name of the XML type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用指定 XML 類型的命名空間、 XML 的型別名稱，以及是否要包含在 XML 結構描述文件類型的類別。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看設定之屬性的結果類別，並編譯為可執行檔或 DLL，應用程式同時傳遞至所產生的檔案[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 工具會將結構描述，包括類型定義。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. ## Examples 下列範例會套用至`Person`和`Job`類別。The following example applies the to the `Person` and `Job` classes. 如果您編譯類別，並將產生的可執行檔至 XML 結構描述定義工具，結構描述會顯示輸出區段中。If you compile the class and pass the resulting executable file to the XML Schema Definition tool, the schema is displayed in the Output section. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
